price: جا کاتێک بۆیان ھات ھەق و ڕاستی لەلایەن ئێمەوە ووتیان بێگومان ئەمە جادوویەکی ڕوون و دیارە!
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِنۡ عِندِنَا قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāahumu al-ḥaqu min ʿindinā qālū inna hādhā lasiḥ'run mubīnun
